    Tests are MANDATORY, please follow these scenarios:
    ðŸ‘‰ðŸ¼ when you are fixing a bug, test should cover regression you fix
    ðŸ‘‰ðŸ¼ when you develop new feature, test should cover at least user stories steps (it can be tested by rendering component that implements given feature)
    ðŸ‘‰ðŸ¼ Please do not implement e2e tests by yourself, we try to limit them for the favor of integration (RTL) ones or units.
    

  ðŸ§µ NOTE: Changesets.
    Each pull request requires changeset file, that you can add by running command: npm run change:add. The prompt will ask you to pick a type of change:
    ðŸ‘‰ðŸ¼ patch - any fix, typo change, CI change, tiny visuals, basically any change that can be seamlessly portable to previous releases
    ðŸ‘‰ðŸ¼ minor - new features, ui changes, everything that will be includes in the upcoming minor release.
